compatibility.notes: The W3C-19980720 license is permissive and allows for both static and dynamic linking with compatible licenses. However, it is incompatible with copyleft licenses like GPL and AGPL.

key_requirements: Ensure that the copyright notice is included in all copies or substantial portions of the software.
Provide a notice of changes made to the original software.
Do not use the names or trademarks of the copyright holders in advertising or publicity without permission.
license.name: W3C-19980720
obligations: Include the full text of the W3C Software Notice and License in all copies or substantial portions of the software.
Include any pre-existing intellectual property disclaimers, notices, or terms and conditions.
Provide notice of any changes or modifications to the W3C files, including the date changes were made.
